Class_Quest_Name_Destruction in the Name: Destruction in the Name of Justice
Class_Quest_Name_One Golem to Rule Them: One Golem to Rule Them All
Class_Skill_Desc_Addle: Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 5% and magic damage dealt by 10%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Aetherial Manipulation: Rush to a target party member's side.</br>Unable to cast if bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Amplifier: Grants Polyglot.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice.
Class_Skill_Desc_Between the Lines: Move instantly to Ley Lines drawn by you.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Blizzard: Deals ice damage with a potency of 180.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice or removes Astral Fire</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Blizzard II: Deals ice damage with a potency of 100 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III and/Grants Umbral Ice or removes Astral Fire</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Blizzard III: Deals ice damage with a potency of 260.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III and removes Astral Fire</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Blizzard IV: Deals ice damage with a potency of 310.</br>Additional Effect: Grants 3 Umbral Hearts</br>Umbral Heart Bonus: Nullifies Astral Fire's MP cost increase for Fire spells and reduces MP cost for Flare by one-third</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Umbral Ice.
Class_Skill_Desc_Despair: Deals fire damage with a potency of 340.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire.
Class_Skill_Desc_Fire: Deals fire damage with a potency of 180.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire or removes Umbral Ice</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: 40% chance next Fire III will cost no MP and have no cast time</br>Duration: 30s/</br>Additional Effect: 40% chance next Fire III will cost no MP and have no cast time</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Fire II: Deals fire damage with a potency of 100 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III and removes Umbral Ice/Grants Astral Fire or removes Umbral Ice</br>Duration: 15s</br>Astral Fire Bonus: Grants Enhanced Flare</br>Effect is canceled if Astral Fire ends.
Class_Skill_Desc_Fire III: Deals fire damage with a potency of 260.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III and removes Umbral Ice</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Fire IV: Deals fire damage with a potency of 310.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire.
Class_Skill_Desc_Flare: Deals fire damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 220 for the first enemy, and 40% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Enhanced Flare Potency: 280</br>//Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire.
Class_Skill_Desc_Foul: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Polyglot Cost: 1
Class_Skill_Desc_Freeze: Deals ice damage with a potency of 120 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Grants 3 Umbral Hearts</br>Umbral Heart Bonus: Nullifies Astral Fire's MP cost increase for Fire spells and reduces MP cost for Flare by one-third</br>//Can only be executed while under the effect of Umbral Ice.
Class_Skill_Desc_High Blizzard II: Deals ice damage with a potency of 140 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III and removes Astral Fire</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_High Fire II: Deals fire damage with a potency of 140 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III and removes Umbral Ice</br>Duration: 15s</br>Astral Fire Bonus: Grants Enhanced Flare</br>Effect is canceled if Astral Fire ends.
Class_Skill_Desc_Ley Lines: Connects naturally occurring ley lines to create a circle of power which, while standing within it, reduces spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 15%.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Manaward: Creates a barrier that nullifies damage totaling up to 30% of maximum HP.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Meteor: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 6,150 to all enemies near point of impact.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Aetherial Manipulat: Rush to a targeted enemy's or party member's location.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Swiftcast</br>Swiftcast Effect: Next spell can be cast immediately</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Blizzard: Deals ice damage with a potency of 4,000.</br>Requires no cast time when cast under the effect of Astral Fire.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with a stack of Umbral Freeze, up to a maximum of 3</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Astral Warmth.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice II</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Astral Fire.</br>※Action changes to Blizzard IV while under the effect of Umbral Ice II.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Blizzard IV: Deals ice damage with a potency of 6,000.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with a stack of Umbral Freeze, up to a maximum of 3</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Astral Warmth.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Astral Fire.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Umbral Ice II.</br>※Action changes to Freeze while under the effect of Umbral Ice III.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Burst: Deals lightning damage to all nearby enemies with a potency of 16,000.</br>Additional Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 16,000 potency</br>Duration: 10s</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Fire: Deals fire damage with a potency of 4,000.</br>Requires no cast time when cast under the effect of Umbral Ice.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with a stack of Astral Warmth, up to a maximum of 3</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Umbral Freeze.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire II</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Umbral Ice.</br>※Action changes to Fire IV while under the effect of Astral Fire II.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Fire IV: Deals fire damage with a potency of 6,000.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with a stack of Astral Warmth, up to a maximum of 3</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Umbral Freeze.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Umbral Ice.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire II.</br>※Action changes to Flare while under the effect of Astral Fire III.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Flare: Deals fire damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and 8,000 to all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with a stack of Astral Warmth, up to a maximum of 3</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Umbral Freeze.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Resonance.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Foul: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 16,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Polyglot.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Freeze: Deals ice damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and 8,000 to all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with a stack of Umbral Freeze, up to a maximum of 3</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Astral Warmth.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Soul Resonance.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Night Wing: Afflicts target and all enemies nearby it with Half-asleep.</br>Duration: 3s</br>Half-asleep Effect: Targets succumb to Sleep when effect expires</br>Duration: 3s</br>Targets struck while under the effect of Sleep will take additional damage with a potency of 8,000, and effect will dissipate.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Paradox: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000.</br>Additional Effect: Increases target's stacks of Astral Warmth or Umbral Freeze to maximum</br>Duration: 15s</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Soul Resonance: Grants 6 stacks of Soul Resonance, upgrading Fire to Flare and Blizzard to Freeze.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Polyglot and Apocatastasis</br>Polyglot Effect: Action changes to Foul</br>Duration: 60s</br>Apocatastasis Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Reduces the recast time of Superflare by 15 seconds</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 60s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Superflare: Deals damage to nearby enemies with a potency of 3,000 up to a maximum of 9,000 for every stack of Astral Warmth or Umbral Freeze they have accumulated.</br>Additional Effect: Enemies under the effect of Astral Warmth are afflicted with Burns, dealing fire damage over time</br>Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 6s</br>Duration increases by 3s for each additional stack of Astral Warmth, up to a maximum of 12s.</br>Additional Effect: Enemies under the effect of Umbral Freeze are afflicted with a status ailment commensurate with the number of stacks accumulated</br>1 Stack: Heavy</br>2 Stacks: Bind</br>3 Stacks: Deep Freeze</br>Duration: 2s</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Paradox: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 500.</br>Astral Fire Bonus: Refreshes the duration of Astral Fire and 40% chance to grant Firestarter</br>Duration: 15s</br>Firestarter Effect: Next Fire III will require no time to cast and cost no MP</br>Duration: 30s</br>Umbral Ice Bonus: Spell is cast immediately, requires no MP to cast, and refreshes the duration of Umbral Ice</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Paradox.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Scathe: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: 20% chance potency will double
Class_Skill_Desc_Sharpcast: Ensures the next Scathe, Fire, Paradox, /or Thunder spell cast will, for the first hit, trigger Scathe's additional effect, Firestarter, or Thundercloud.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Maximum Charges: 2//
Class_Skill_Desc_Skyshard: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 1,650 to all enemies near point of impact.
Class_Skill_Desc_Sleep: Puts target and all nearby enemies to sleep.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Starstorm: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 3,600 to all enemies near point of impact.
Class_Skill_Desc_Surecast: Spells can be cast without interruption.</br>Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects</br>Duration: 6s
Class_Skill_Desc_Thunder: Deals lightning damage with a potency of 30.</br>Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time</br>Potency: 35</br>Duration: 21s</br>Additional Effect: 10% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP</br>Duration: 40s</br>/</br>Additional Effect: 10% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP</br>Duration: 40s</br>/</br>/</br>Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Thunder II: Deals lightning damage with a potency of 50 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time</br>Potency: 15</br>Duration: 18s</br>Additional Effect: 3% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP</br>Duration: 40s</br>/</br>Additional Effect: 3% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP</br>Duration: 40s</br>/</br>/</br>Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Thunder III: Deals lightning damage with a potency of 50.</br>Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time</br>Potency: 35</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: 10% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP</br>Duration: 40s</br>/</br>Additional Effect: 10% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP</br>Duration: 40s</br>/</br>/</br>Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Thunder IV: Deals lightning damage with a potency of 50 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time</br>Potency: 20</br>Duration: 18s</br>Additional Effect: 3% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP</br>Duration: 40s</br>Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Transpose: Swaps Astral Fire with a single Umbral Ice, or Umbral Ice with a single Astral Fire.
Class_Skill_Desc_Triplecast: The next three spells will require no cast time.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Umbral Soul: Grants Umbral Ice and 1 Umbral Heart.</br>Umbral Heart Bonus: Nullifies Astral Fire's MP cost increase for Fire spells and reduces MP cost for Flare by one-third</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Umbral Ice.
Class_Skill_Desc_Xenoglossy: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 880.</br>Polyglot Cost: 1
Class_Status_Desc_Burst: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Manaward: An aetherial barrier is preventing damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Soul Resonance: Spells require no time to cast. Fire is upgraded to Flare and Blizzard is upgraded to Freeze.
Class_Status_Desc_Surecast: Spells cannot be interrupted by taking damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Swiftcast: The next spell will be cast immediately.
Class_Trait_Desc_Aspect Mastery: Casting of certain fire and ice spells will grant a stack of Astral Fire and Umbral Ice respectively.</br>Maximum Stacks: 1</br>Duration: 15s</br>While under the effect of either Astral Fire or Umbral Ice, casting a spell of the opposite element will consume no MP.</br>Effect does not apply to Flare.
Class_Trait_Desc_Aspect Mastery II: Allows the stacking of a second Astral Fire and Umbral Ice.
Class_Trait_Desc_Aspect Mastery III: Allows the stacking of a third Astral Fire and Umbral Ice.</br>Casting Fire II or Blizzard II grants maximum stacks of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice respectively.</br>When maintaining three stacks of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice, the cast time of spells of the opposite element is halved.
Class_Trait_Desc_Aspect Mastery IV: Upgrades Fire II and Blizzard II to High Fire II and High Blizzard II.
Class_Trait_Desc_Aspect Mastery V: Adds a Paradox marker to your Elemental Gauge.</br>The marker is made active after reaching Astral Fire III then swapping to the opposite element. Conversely, the marker can also be made active after reaching Umbral Ice III and gaining 3 Umbral Hearts then swapping to the opposite element.</br>Blizzard and Fire become Paradox when the Paradox marker is made active.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Enochian: Grants the effect of Polyglot upon maintaining Enochian for 30 seconds. Also improves Enochian's magic damage increase to 10%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Enochian II: Improves Enochian's magic damage increase to 15%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Enochian III: Improves Enochian's magic damage increase to 23%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Foul: Allows for the immediate casting of Foul.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Freeze: Grants 3 Umbral Hearts upon casting Freeze.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Manafont: Reduces Manafont recast time to 120 seconds.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Polyglot: Allows the stacking of a second Polyglot.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Sharpcast: Reduces Sharpcast recast timer to 30 seconds.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Sharpcast II: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Sharpcast.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Enochian: Increases damage dealt by 5% while under the effect of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice.</br>Upon successfully landing Fire II while under the effect of Astral Fire, grants Enhanced Flare.</br>Enhanced Flare effect ends if Astral Fire is lost.
Class_Trait_Desc_Firestarter: Grants a 40% chance that after casting Fire, your next Fire III will require no MP and have no cast time.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend II: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Thunder Mastery II: Upgrades Thunder II to Thunder IV.
Class_Trait_Desc_Thundercloud: Grants a 10% chance that after each damage over time tick inflicted by Thunder or Thunder III (3% for Thunder II or Thunder IV), the next Thunder, Thunder II, Thunder III, or Thunder IV will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP.</br>Duration: 40s
